testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Navigate to application homepage
Verify multiple interactive elements exist (navigation menu, buttons, image gallery)
Check for proper navigation structure with working links
Verify application shows real image showcase features, not placeholder content
Confirm responsive design elements are present
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application shows functional image showcase features with navigation, gallery, and interactivity
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder or basic template, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: Navigation System Test
testCases.description: Test that navigation menu and routing work correctly
steps: Check top navigation bar is visible and fixed
Click on 'Explore' link and verify it navigates to explore page
Click on 'Featured' link and verify it navigates to featured galleries
Verify logo/home link returns to homepage
Test authentication-dependent navigation (Login/Signup vs User menu)
testCases.expectedOutcome: All navigation links work correctly and show appropriate content

testCases.name: Homepage Content Test
testCases.description: Verify homepage displays image showcases and content properly
steps: Load homepage and check for 'Explore Showcases' heading
Verify image grid layout is present
Check that images are displayed with titles and descriptions
Verify 'View Image' links are present on showcase cards
Test loading states and error handling
testCases.expectedOutcome: Homepage displays image showcases in a responsive grid with proper metadata

testCases.name: Authentication Flow Test
testCases.description: Test user registration and login functionality
steps: Navigate to login/signup page via navigation
Verify login form has email and password fields
Test form validation with empty fields
Switch to signup mode and verify additional username field appears
Test password confirmation validation
Verify error messages display for invalid inputs
testCases.expectedOutcome: Authentication forms work with proper validation and error handling

testCases.name: Image Upload Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test image upload feature for authenticated users
steps: Navigate to upload page (should require authentication)
Verify upload form has file input, title, description, and tags fields
Test form validation for required fields
Check file type restrictions (PNG, JPEG)
Verify upload button and loading states
Test success and error message display
testCases.expectedOutcome: Upload form works with proper validation and file handling

testCases.name: Image Exploration Test
testCases.description: Test image browsing and filtering functionality
steps: Navigate to explore page
Verify sidebar with filter options is present
Test category filters (e.g., Landscapes)
Test sort options (e.g., Newest)
Verify image grid displays filtered results
Test individual image links navigate to detail pages
testCases.expectedOutcome: Explore page shows filterable image gallery with working navigation

testCases.name: Responsive Design Test
testCases.description: Test application responsiveness across different screen sizes
steps: Test navigation menu on mobile devices
Verify image grid adapts to different screen sizes
Check that forms remain usable on smaller screens
Test touch interactions on mobile
Verify text remains readable at different zoom levels
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application maintains usability and visual appeal across all device sizes

testCases.name: Image Detail Page Test
testCases.description: Test individual image detail pages and interactions
steps: Click on an image from homepage or explore page
Verify image detail page loads with full-size image
Check that image metadata (title, description, tags) is displayed
Test comment section if present
Test like functionality if present
Verify back navigation works
testCases.expectedOutcome: Image detail pages display complete information with working interactions

testCases.name: Search Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test search capabilities across the application
steps: Look for search input field in navigation or explore page
Test search with various keywords
Verify search results display relevant images
Test empty search results handling
Check search result pagination if present
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search functionality returns relevant results with proper handling of edge cases

testCases.name: User Profile Test
testCases.description: Test user profile pages and profile management
steps: Navigate to a user profile page
Verify user information is displayed
Check user's uploaded images are shown
Test profile editing functionality if authenticated as profile owner
Verify follow/unfollow functionality if present
testCases.expectedOutcome: User profiles display complete information with appropriate interaction options

testCases.name: Error Handling Test
testCases.description: Test application behavior with various error conditions
steps: Test navigation to non-existent pages
Test form submissions with invalid data
Test image loading failures
Test network connectivity issues
Verify appropriate error messages are displayed
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application handles errors gracefully with informative user feedback

testCases.name: Performance Test
testCases.description: Test application loading speed and performance
steps: Measure initial page load time
Test image loading performance in galleries
Check for smooth scrolling and interactions
Verify lazy loading of images if implemented
Test application with large numbers of images
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application loads quickly and maintains smooth performance during use

testCases.name: Social Features Test
testCases.description: Test social interaction features like comments, likes, and follows
steps: Test commenting on images
Test liking/unliking images
Test following/unfollowing users
Check notifications for social interactions
Verify social counters update correctly
testCases.expectedOutcome: Social features work correctly with real-time updates and proper feedback

testCases.name: Accessibility Test
steps: Test keyboard navigation throughout the application
Verify alt text is present on images
Check color contrast ratios
Test with screen reader compatibility
Verify form labels and ARIA attributes
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application is accessible to users with disabilities and follows WCAG guidelines

testCases.name: Data Persistence Test
testCases.description: Test that user data and application state persist correctly
steps: Login and verify session persists after page refresh
Upload an image and verify it appears in user's gallery
Create collections or showcases and verify they're saved
Test logout and verify session is properly cleared
Test browser storage and state management
testCases.expectedOutcome: User data and application state persist correctly across sessions
